root.name: Tumble Pop
root.description: OverviewTumblepop is considered a cult classic, and plays similarly to Snow Bros or Bubble Bobble. Like many of those types of platformers, it also includes an invisible rage timer: if you don't complete the level fast enough, a vampire will appear, which can kill you in one hit.It features a number of locales such as Egypt, Moscow, Paris, Rio, New York City, Australia, Antarctica, Japan, Australia, Space, and the Moon.The Game Boy version incorporates a shop that's not found in the Arcade version.
